titleStmt.title: An humble supplicacion vnto God for the restoring of hys holye woorde, vnto the churche of Englande, mooste mete to be sayde in these oure dayes, euen with teares of euery true [and] faythfull English harte.
titleStmt.author: Becon, Thomas, 1512-1567.

titleStmt.title: An humble supplicacion vnto God for the restoring of hys holye woorde, vnto the churche of Englande, mooste mete to be sayde in these oure dayes, euen with teares of euery true [and] faythfull English harte.
titleStmt.author: Becon, Thomas, 1512-1567.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By J. Lambrecht?] at the signe of the golde[n] bibell,
publicationStmt.pubPlace: Imprynted at Strasburgh in Elsas [i.e. Wesel?] :
publicationStmt.date: In the moneth of Auguste. the yeare of our Lord. 1554.

notesStmt.note: The imprint is false. Actual place of publication and printer's name conjectured by STC.
Formerly identified as STC 10384 and also 23435.
Identified as STC 10384 on UMI microfilm reel 222.
Reproductions of the originals in Cambridge University Library and the Bodleian Library.
Appears at reel 25 (Cambridge University Library. copy) and at reel 222 (Bodleian copy).
